name: The Popular Wave - GGJ 2017
description:
+++ Introduction

Be a president and give the speech of your life. But keep an eye on the non supporters, before they become a problem for your success.

Your goal is to keep the attendants at your speech waving, this will keep the president happy. As soon as some of them stop moving, focus them for a moment with your "eyes" and they start waving again.

+++ Controls

The Popular Wave was designed to be played with Tobii Eye Tracker which was one of the technology diversifiers in that year (Beyond the doors of perception - Tobii Sponsored).

Since we can not assume everybody has one at home ;-) you can also play with your mouse. Whenever the game says "Look at", just move your pointer over the target and wait for the bar to fill.

+++ Global Game Jam

Link: https://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/popular-wave
